• BeechServer 1.0

This is where you can inform user about your application and API in general.

Resources

Beers
Beer related endpoints

Resource Description
GET /api/beers List all beers
POST /api/beers Create a beer

Checks

Resource Description
POST /api/checks Create a check

Feed

Resource Description
GET /api/my/feed

Followers

Resource Description
GET /api/my/followers List followers
GET /api/users/:user_id/followers List followers

Followings

Resource Description
GET /api/my/followings List followings
GET /api/users/:user_id/followings List followings
POST /api/my/followings Create a following
DELETE /api/my/followings Destroy a following

My badges

Resource Description
GET /api/my/badges List my badges
GET /api/users/:user_id/badges List my badges

My beers

Resource Description
GET /api/my/beers List my beers
GET /api/users/:user_id/beers List my beers

Profiles

Resource Description
GET /api/my/profile Show a profile
GET /api/users/:user_id/profile Show a profile
PUT /api/my/profile Update a profile

Users

Resource Description
GET /api/users List users
